citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am on
11-JUL-18.
Facility was closed when inspector arrived. Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left a message. Left
business card on front door. Prior to leaving the facility another call by phone was made and left a message.
Departed facility at 12:00 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 am on
11-JUL-18.
Facility was closed when inspector arrived.  Attempted to contact licensee by phone and left a message.  Left
business card on front door.  Prior to leaving the facility another call by phone was made and left a message.
Departed facility at 12:00 pm.
